Summary: Shiny star like object and a red glowing sphere
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Lewiston
There were no other sightings in Lewiston on or around July 23rd 2010
divs: sighting detailsin our backyard, my fiance noticed some seagulls in the sky and noticed another object of higher altitude. upon observing for approximately 30 seconds he determined the object appeared to be stationary. he said there is something in the sky and pointed to the direction sse. i couldnt see anything so he went to get the binoculars. my fiance saw a star-like object in the sky. upon viewing the object with 10x binoculars revealed a second glowing red object. both objects changed distance from one another. at first, the red object was apart from the star-like object and then upon a second look several minutes later the red object appeared to be close to the star-like object. i looked through the 10x binoculars to see five shining orbs. one blue, one pink\red and three white. three of the objects appeared to be moving together to form a line vertically while the other two remained stationary. then the objects seemed to fade away.
